Class SurveyCode

  • java.lang.Object
    • SurveyCode

  • public class SurveyCode
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the logic for all user prompts and taking in user entries, reading in survey data, creating an array of objects to store the data, and for filtering the data and writing to a location and file for the user
    Author:
    armondluthens

      private static int[] filterData(java.util.ArrayList<SurveyObjects> surveyTable, java.lang.String filter, java.lang.String demographic)
      Takes in the object array, product, and demographic to filter data on and returns an integer array of the product rating and the frequency of each rating by the particular demographic

      Method that prompts user to enter a demographic to filter data on

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start()
        Method that drives the methods of Survey class. This method calls for all the user inputs, and then calls the methods to read the data in, and the method the write the data to the output location.
